text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>5. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"1.
